member.name: T:ParaglidingWeather.Providers.IForecastProvider
member.summary: Represents a data reader that returns a weather forecast.

member.name: M:ParaglidingWeather.Providers.IForecastProvider.GetForecast(ParaglidingWeather.Core.Types.Coordinate)
member.summary: Returns the weather forecast for the week or fewer number available days.
member.param: The geographic coordinate of the location.

member.name: M:ParaglidingWeather.Providers.IForecastProvider.GetForecastAsync(ParaglidingWeather.Core.Types.Coordinate)
member.summary: Returns the weather forecast for the week or fewer number available days in an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The geographic coordinate of the location.
member.returns: Returns the task object representing the asynchronous operation.
